<section begin=summary />The '''Rabbit Hair Needle''' is a Kekkei Mōra taijutsu used by Kaguya Ōtsutsuki.<section end=summary />

== Usage ==
Kaguya hardens her lengthened hair to launch many needles with enough ferocity to pierce even [[Sasuke]]'s [[Susanoo]]. By using her [[Byakugan]], she targets the vital points of her enemy. It's a technique that effectively seals the movements of an enemy.

== Trivia ==
* When written as "棘", "toge" means "thorn; splinter".
